comments: Love this game. My only issue is with an update a few days ago that gives the background animation. I  have visual issues and the movement is making this game less enjoyable for me. One of the reasons that I  love word games is because the screen is without animation. It would be great if this was an option that could be turned off in settings.

So good I've finished it! Great game for stimulating the mind. Waiting for new levels but at least I can still do the daily puzzle. Only downside is that some of the words are extremely obsure but the dictionary should help with those. Please hurry and add new levels.... I'm addicted!

Challenging, fun and interactive! Great app for those who likes brain and vocabulary challenges :D Down side is that after the update, the butterflies run out in daily challenge even before i finish the puzzle so I always end up with 2 stars... please fix this bug or error...

Very good but log in or if u change phone u loose ur game & start again! 😂 very frustrating when so far in lol! Also why is lea not a word i thought it was a meadow in the english dictionary? Am i wrong?

Where did the free hints in exchange for ads go?  They had recently moved to their own button, found by hitting "Shop" then X-ing out.  Today, they are completely gone.  I'm going to stop playing this game without them.  It's no fun to get stuck.

Ok. This is my THIRD review of this game and I'm getting a little upset. You put the clues back. Thank you very much for listening to us all. Now I have a new issue with the way you have changed this game. Before People Fun came along, when we put a word into the puzzle, sometimes we would see things like, "Excellent!" Or, "Spectacular!" pop out at us. I noticed this morning that you've taken away that feature. Why? This game was absolutely perfect when you came along. Why are you changing it? Who are you, that you would take a perfect game and then take away the best features? Those words popping out made the game more fun, and they encouraged us to keep going, and yeah, I don't mind saying it. They made us feel good about ourselves. It was a pat on the back. Who gets many of those these days? And you took that away from us. Now this game is dry and boring. Please put the pats on the back, back. Thank you.

comments: I like the game its fun and engaging but the premium choices cost a lot of diamonds and you don't get a lot opportunity to earn them. 12- 18 diamonds for more then a couple  choices in a story to make interesting choices that wouldmake the storys better but you only earn 1 diamond a chapter witch you have to wait an hour or more to unlock or buy keys.  So you pretty much have to spend real money for this game to really enjoy it. Ill be deleting this app not worth my time.

While the game is enjoyable and the stories are intriguing, it is way too expensive to make certain choices. There is absolutely no need for choices to cost 20 or 25 diamonds when you only get 1 diamond for each chapter completed.  This game is in no way good enough to warrant spending real money on it, especially considering the ridiculously high prices of making certain choices which would require making a purchase in every single chapter.

The game is great. Great graphics, nice music, perfectly cued entrees  for new characters, amazing story line.... But they don't give you enough keys or diamonds. I mean, y s its understandable that the chapters are long but 2hrs for a recharge on keys? Really? Either make the waiting time shorter, give us more, or both. Now as for the diamonds, they give you 25 of them. But each special choices is always way to much. And you never really know when your going to need them for something serious. With that said either give us more keys, lower the cost of the choice, or give us more diamonds per chapter. Not like 2 but 5 or more.

It's a brilliant app, though sometimes I wish there wasn't as many gem choices. I fully considered buying gems until I realised how quickly they'd be used.   My favourite story was It Lives In The Woods, though most of the choices are gem choices. The story itself is fantastic, and I love the diversity of characters.   I had a problem with a story playing up and after a chat with the team was told to restart it. I didn't mind but I didn't get any keys to compensate what I'd already spent (I don't buy them I just wait for then to recharge, but it did mean I had to respend keys on one story because of a issue out of my control)   Overall its a great app and highly playable without spending.

Diamond choices come up way too often for how much they cost and how little you get. The keys have an unreasonably long cooldown to get them. Options like watching ads to get diamonds would be a great option, especially seeings how you have that option in HSS and HU:RS. All that aside its a good game. Lots of the stories are enjoyable and its visually pleasing.

Great graphics and great stories. Right now they have like 30 "books", so there are lots of options. I've been playing since 2016 and the app just keeps getting better. Can get a little pricey for the preminum choices, but otherwise it's a fantastic app; very additive and entertaining
description: One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!- Form alliances to build your army.- Master unique weapons.- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.- Examine evidence at crime scenes.- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we’ve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we’ve created our best work to date. We hope you’ll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.Enjoy,- The Pixelberry Team
descriptionHTML:
One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:


THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?

- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.
- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.
- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!

THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!

- Form alliances to build your army.
- Master unique weapons.
- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.
- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!

MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?

- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.
- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.
- Examine evidence at crime scenes.
- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!

...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!

Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.

Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.

Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we’ve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.

But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we’ve created our best work to date. We hope you’ll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.

Enjoy,

- The Pixelberry Team
developerAddress:
Pixelberry Studios
201 SAN ANTONIO CIR 205
MOUNTAIN VIEW, CA, 94040-1271, US

Thanks to all our players for your support! You make this all possible! And if you love Choices, let us know by leaving a FIVE-STAR REVIEW!
summary: Fall in love or go on adventures in stories where YOU control what happens!
title: Choices: Stories You Play

comments: The game is nice, the graphics is cool and all but I could rarely play it, why? Because when I click the restart button then click the screen I would always end up behind the starting point even though I didn't move yet I die immediately why is that? pls fix it, everyone who played this game of yours would appreciate that.☺️😉 (btw I kept on dying on the first part of the game because of that so....I deleted the game!😀).

Just extremely broken, can't even play the game without the ball not touching the first platform and falling off the map or the game's score just going up while nothing is happening. The game is too hectic and the gravity is too much compared to the last update. It's a really good idea but I hope this isn't just a quick grab for cash.

Having to restart the app every time you want to play instead of being able to hit RESTART sucks.  The app won't let you restart a game without a glitched ball each time.  Also, the speed of the ball is ridiculously inconsistent.  Sometimes you get games that are at a reasonable speed and other times it seems like the ball speed has increased an unreasonable amount to play.  Why even bother trying to load the game each time anymore?

The game is extremely broken. I can't start a game without falling off the map, and there are times when I don't even play it's a blank screen and my points meter goes up. It's a very broken game I'm thoroughly disappointed.

it is extremely broken. after the first death, it starts you out right in front of the start platform and you cant play it again unless you completely close the app. its a shame that they dont even test the game before they launch it and that google play cant prevent it from launching in the first place. great game, but extremely broken.

Poor quality game that wasn't tested before release! After your first death you can't land on the platform upon restarting and immediately die, the only way to have another go is to completely close the app first.

comments: Only given a 1 star so the devs hurry up and get the game working again or else it would be a 5 star. This is the best game on play store currently and square Enix have done a brilliant job. No complaints... No p2w... and the graphics if you set them to full are just phenomenal!!! Keep it up guys!! But fix the loading issue so we can get back to akademia!!

Great game so far. Not sure if there is a community forum or something somewhere which would be nice. I had a character on some other server and it seemed to be erased when the new server opened? Its fine though, previous character did not have too much progression. Music is not the greatest though, would be good if you could include more classic FF music in the game.   Dailys seem a bit overwhelming. There are so many quests to complete each day to get all the chests.   Other than that im quite enjoying it. If you can't load the game after update clear data and dl again

Support is incredibly slow, they will happily take your money and not let you have access to the items you payed for. Will update this review if they ever actually resolve my issue. It has been 5 days since I submitted a support issue with no useful responses made by them. Update: over 48 hours since last response still not any closer to having my issue resolved

I installed the game. I was enjoying it then suddenly it stoped working giving me an error message of "license stoped working". I uninstalled it and will try to install it. I hope this time it won't happen again.   What?? Still having the same error! Please do something about it, since the game is really nice.

I was hooked up playing this game as you can still get stronger without spending. Unfortunately looks like something broke during the update and was stucked in the FF splash screen. Hoping that the devs are on top of this and release an official announcement to players.

Characters repeat the same thing over and over and it gets really irritating. And now the game doesn't even start, i love the final fantasy franchise and you have a really great game, and i like that you have to interact with the game to stay alive and it's not just automatic bullcrap, please keep updating the game.
description: 【Game Introduction】:An officially licensed SQUARE ENIX FINAL FANTASY game for your phone, Final Fantasy Awakening features high-speed, action-packed ARPG online gameplay, tons of characters and a familiar cast such as the Chocobos and gigantic Summons. (Please be patient with downloading the game due to the large size)Get ready to enter the world of Orience, the same universe of previous hits like Final Fantasy Type-0 and Final Fantasy Agito, chose your favourite class and hack, slash, shoot and explore the world by yourself or with others.【Features】:-Taking FINAL FANTASY TYPE-0’s console controls perfectly to your mobile phone: dash, attack, explore and triumph with smooth and intuitive controls. Seamlessly switch between character menu to battlefield and World Map.-Top-notch graphics CG trailers to immerse you into the legendary world of Orience and make you part of a story worthy of the name Final Fantasy, including exclusive and original VO of the Japanese cast.-Classic Final Fantasy gameplay mixed with brand new ones: Explore the world map in the World Adventure Mode, team-up with others in multiplayer dungeons, challenge players in the Arena, test your endurance in the Infinite Trials mode and go full out in 9 vs 9 Throne Paragons mode.-Summons Summons Summons! Series famous summons like Bahamut, Odin, Shiva and Ifrit will be unlockable and help you in your battles, including those versus the plentiful and gigantic End Bosses.Official webpage: https://mffaen.oasgames.com/Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/finalfantasyawakening.en/Customer support: https://support-center.oasgames.com/
descriptionHTML:
【Game Introduction】:

An officially licensed SQUARE ENIX FINAL FANTASY game for your phone, Final Fantasy Awakening features high-speed, action-packed ARPG online gameplay, tons of characters and a familiar cast such as the Chocobos and gigantic Summons. (Please be patient with downloading the game due to the large size)

Get ready to enter the world of Orience, the same universe of previous hits like Final Fantasy Type-0 and Final Fantasy Agito, chose your favourite class and hack, slash, shoot and explore the world by yourself or with others.

【Features】:

-Taking FINAL FANTASY TYPE-0’s console controls perfectly to your mobile phone: dash, attack, explore and triumph with smooth and intuitive controls. Seamlessly switch between character menu to battlefield and World Map.

-Top-notch graphics CG trailers to immerse you into the legendary world of Orience and make you part of a story worthy of the name Final Fantasy, including exclusive and original VO of the Japanese cast.

-Classic Final Fantasy gameplay mixed with brand new ones: Explore the world map in the World Adventure Mode, team-up with others in multiplayer dungeons, challenge players in the Arena, test your endurance in the Infinite Trials mode and go full out in 9 vs 9 Throne Paragons mode.

-Summons Summons Summons! Series famous summons like Bahamut, Odin, Shiva and Ifrit will be unlockable and help you in your battles, including those versus the plentiful and gigantic End Bosses.

Official webpage: https://mffaen.oasgames.com/
Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/finalfantasyawakening.en/
Customer support: https://support-center.oasgames.com/
developerAddress: 1 Queen's Road Central, Hong Kong
recentChanges: The bugs on account connecting and switching are fixed.
summary: The Sole SQUARE ENIX Official Licensed "Final Fantasy" Action Game
title: Final Fantasy Awakening: SE Licensed

comments: Lots of fun. Unfortunately, the other day I had to do a factory reset on my phone. When I installed Design Home afterwards, all of my designs, progress...all of the money I've spent on the game for over a year was/ is gone. It created a totally different designer number (profile) for me. It wasn't connected to my Facebook for privacy reasons, but now? I don't know if I can keep playing, if I have to start all the way over. If you want to play, you'd better link it to Facebook.

This is an awesome game.  Especially since I love decorating.   Few things though,  how about pillows on the plain sofas, modern pictures for modern furniture,  traditional scones, etc, for traditional designs, and more diamonds or stop using extra sofas and expenses that take away our diamonds. We need more accessories for the tables like books, vases, and flowers, also how about some better pictures because your choices are by far not worth $1000.00.  Last but not least, more colors in furniture with two or three toned designs.  That's what designers look for.  Thank you! Still love the game.

The game is addictive. I wish that we could see who we are up against in the voting to better understand the rating we receive. It would be great if we had the chance to buy limited accessories 1 more time. I love the new challenges that we have received in the last few weeks. I've noticed every time you make an update that I have lost some furniture why? I do not like that you have increased the dollar value of buying the highest amount of gems. I won't buy again. Losing intrerest real fast.   Thanks again.

I super loved this game and I am glad tapjoy is back.  I just have an issue lately.  I completed an offer lately but never got rewarded.  It says it might take 24 hours for the submit button to appear so I can contact customer support but it's been 3 days now and it still says pending.  I have no other way to report it.  Please look into this. Voting is an issue but it's the players who are voting and they vote for whatever they think has a better design no matter if they follow the requirements, you can only use a furniture for a limited time and will have to purchase it again if you want it.  I understand those things but I hope the reward for every design completed is higher than 500 so we''ll have more to spend and make the furniture more affordable.  Otherwise, this app is one of the best!

I love this game concept. I also like the "borrow" option but I don't have anyone to borrow from because everyone I know stops playing because it's too difficult to advance (achieve 5 stars, which is the quickest and nearly impossible way to do so. Impossible because your advancement is based on user preference). A "sort by price" filter would also be cool for those of us who enjoy this game but are on a limited budget.

I wish rating took into account the design assignment. People design completely different styles than the description and as long as they design in black and white or a neutral palette it will win votes over a design that is actually following the instructions. Contemporary design beats Mediterranean or Eclectic every time. There's no point in even entering those contests because people who do a contemporary design will cancel your design out.

Great time waster and slightly addicting. Nice thing is you can pause playing and continue later at any time. However I'm giving it a low rating because I just looked and it's used 8 HUNDRED MBs of background data this month. That's absurd!

Other than all of this, the game is enjoyable to play.

comments: Just downloaded this app.  So far a very well executed app with excellent layout and controls/easy and fluid to use.  Much better than other Sodoku b/c no ads during actual game play!  The only "con" is that I cant put graphics behind gameboard. Only suggestion: Would like to see options for backgrounds like in Solitaire. This would truely make it a 5 star game!   Ps. I was not paid/reimbursed or otherwise incentivised for this review in any way.

I'm addicted to this game especially the daily challenge boards. Pros: pencil feature, all instances of the number Are highlighted when you fill in a cell. Con: the timer starts when board opens, would like it to start after filling in 1st cell. As others have said the ads are right below the numbers, too easy to tap when your on a roll.

I like this app, but it feels like it could be more educational. I get stuck on the expert puzzles and often have to use the hints, the way the hints just tell you the number in a selected square doesn't help me work out what I'm missing. If the hint could show me how I could reveal another number would be more helpful to me. Otherwise top notch app

It's a pretty decent sudoku implementation, far better than a lot of the other ones out there I should say. The only issues I have are firstly I do find the "penciled" numbers to be a little on the small side (on a 5.5" screen). I'd also say that for those of us that don't find the "expert" setting particularly difficult (without meaning to sound arrogant), it would be good to have a step above that. And finally a Google Play leaderboard would be a nice addition. None of these are massive problems, it's a good app as I said.

Great app. I can do Sudoku on the app with the 'write' facility for numerical notes and I like how it removes them automatically as you fill in other areas. But I still find it very difficult to do paper Sudokus because I can't fill in the right answers without loads of workings out on the more challenging puzzles. The app makes this aspect easy.

I would greatly prefer to start by touching a number rather than touching a cell.  I have to hunt for a cell with the number I am working with, touch that to show where all instances of that number are, then touch each cell and the number to place either the number or a note that this might be the number.  If I could select the number first, I would only have to touch each cell to place that number, then turn on "note mode" and touch each cell for a note.  Only half the taps per game, saving both time and the muscles in my arthritic hands!
description: Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.Features✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuckMore features- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakesHighlights• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles• 9x9 grid• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert• Support both phones and tablets• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets• Simple and intuitive designTrain your brain anywhere, anytime!
descriptionHTML:
Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.

Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.

Features
✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies
✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuck

More features
- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakes

Highlights
• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles
• 9x9 grid
• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert
• Support both phones and tablets
• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
• Simple and intuitive design

Train your brain anywhere, anytime!

title: Sudoku

comments: Ok best game ever. I always dreamed of playing games like pubg or ml something like that but its just not my thing yknow? How its hard to control and super annoying to play. But this god this takes the trophy. Easy control, fun game play, get to live again after dying so no need to be sad so yeah well done gi

Update: Game was fixed very fast and is my favorite game. Everyone should download and play this game. It's simply amazing with great graphics!!! Only thing is why can't we have a woman character? I'm a woman in real life and want to play one online too!!! When are you all going to add women characters???

Graphics are good an Gun play is pretty fair. When battling the game goes on runs where I get matched against teams whos members are way stronger then my team an I. Then it goes back to fair match making.   3 Month UPDATE: The game has turned into a money grab. You have no chance to compete against players that drop a bunch of money an have 4 an 5 star guns. This was the top shooting game in my opinion, but turning it into a pay to compete killed the fun with this game. Havent been match fairly against players in a couple weeks now. I would recommend trying a different p vs p shooting game.

Amazing game, however there is one small problem, but not enough for me to not give it 5 stars. Recently when I've been watching an ad to double the reward at the end of the battle, the video has played until the end and it says the reward has been doubled, but I only receive the regular reward? It has happened 15-20 times and it's getting slightly annoying, as I'm about 4000 gunbucks short of what I should be now. Anyways, thanks for making such an awesome free game with little to no adverts!  UPDATE: video watching for additional rewards does not work with anything. No extra crates or supplies

One of the best fps I've played. Graphics is cartoonish but fun, Remedy is underpowered in the sense that it doesn't generate a decent HP on each hit. On lower levels, it's decent but on higher levels against Porcupine, Ranger, Thunder it doesn't stand a chance that could be balanced out by either increasing the rate of fire or increased health generation on each hit , Lifestealer is pretty darn awesome but could do better with a bit smaller crosshair and little bit more accuracy

Initially the game seems super addictive but once you hit level 16 it gets ridiculous. You have players who have spent money on guns and you're practically no match. Also the teaming of players should be balanced out. Another thing is even if you win a match you win around 30 trophies, if you lose there's a loss of 60 and if by chance you're internet is bad and you automatically get kicked out and cannot reenter you lose a 100 .Eventually you get sick and tired of all this and the game gets boring.
description: ✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be! • Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!Soldier! You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then! This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!Notice: Please note that Google ARCore, which is used in our game, may collect and process your data: www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/
descriptionHTML:
✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer
✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me
✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers
✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity
✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps

• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!
• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!
• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.
• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be!
• Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!
• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!


Soldier!
You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then!

This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!
Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!

Notice: Please note that Google ARCore, which is used in our game, may collect and process your data: www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/

BALANCE UPDATE
- Rebalanced 6 guns
summary: Explosive FPS with super easy controls and non-stop PvP action!

Well this is a surprise. It does not have much story yet but a good read if you've every played pixel berry's "choices" game. Same concept which means choices are going to need diamonds. Meaning you need to pay to do them. I really find it a nice read but since the books are few i'm on hold on purchasing diamonds. I guess once a series is completed i'm willing to buy diamonds to replay that game. For now i'm just browsing the game and taking notes on how many diamonds are going to cost per book.

This game is amazing! The graphic is pretty great, plus the story is super ADDICTIVE. I can't stop reading this story but because of I have no pass left. However the problem is the pass, the pass is too little and the time is pretty long to wait. I hope this app would give much pass and please make the time shorter. But still this game is awesome, I recommend this game for you. You should download this app and try it.

Love story games but it requires me to pay so much. It would have been decent if i spend only $3 or less for a game but pay almost $10 to play it especially if you want the characters to grow into liking each other. Its way too expensive. Need to reassess and sell the passes n diamonds cheaper! Otherwise it would have been a nice game. Its too much money.. cos they only let you play first 1 to 3 or so episodes for free n the remaining ones need passes n diamond which cost money. At some situation some diamonds requested are way too much...

Great game! Awesome and enjoyable storyline, alongside with great characters! My favorite series is for sure the Campus Hacker books! Definitely recommend this app. Ads come up every so often, and you don't get very many passes, but other than that it's awesome!

descriptionHTML:
Your story begins here!
Wanna enjoy living on campus with amazing friends?
Wanna find love with the mysteriously luring vampire?
The choice is yours!

The wiser your choice is, the more interesting your story gets.
You can never put your phone down as these weekly-added stories make you insatiable!

◆Campus Hacker◆
Alice the partygoer and Faith the unexpected are your roommates.
When Norman the football player decides to move in to your flat, things get a little crazy...

- Norman the football player, Peter the gamer, and Dean the aspiring actor are the candidates. Who can make you fall in love?
- Problems at home can be solved if your choice is correct.
- Your choice of an answer also affect your friendship and their lives. It's something to consider when choosing an option.

◆Untold Darkness◆
Alex St. Cyr is a member of the famous on-campus residence the House St. Cyr.
On the way home after a party, you witness a girl who gets attacked by a man with fiery red eyes.
How does this incident affect your life?
And what are the secrets of the St. Cyr family?

- Sexy and daring boys like Alex and Max make the story more thrilling!
- Solve the mystery of the St. Cyr family.
- Work hand and win the journalist competition!

◆Yearbook◆
Your friend Daisy goes missing when you come to meet a detective who has recently moved in to town.
Carl the detective and his assistant Stanley as well as Troy the classmate want to help you locate Daisy.
Will you succeed in saving Daisy?
Carl's dark past gets revealed as the search makes a progress...

- Solve the mystery of Daisy's missing case.
- Use your impressive memory to help Stanley locate his missing item.
- Disguise and attend a party to catch the pickpocket!

◆Hit the Floor!◆
Worst day ever! You lose job and boyfriend on the same day!
While wandering the city feeling sucky, you run into your ex Ken in front of a bar.
Remembering the good old times, you decide to start all over.

- Work hard to sign the record deal!
- David the producer, Adrian the pianist, and Ken the ex. Who has the ability to shine you on the stage the most?

◆Features◆
- Add stories weekly.
- Offer HQ graphic.
- Divide up into genres.
- Customize the look of a protagonist.
- Change storylines depending on options.
- Choose appearances depending on occasions.
- Bookmark your favorite episode!

Official Website: http://myshelfapp.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyShelf.NTTSolmare/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MyShelf_Solmare
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/myshelf_solmare/

◆About Us◆
NTT Solmare is a Japanese company based in Osaka, Japan. We strive to make the best simulation apps for adults. Our sims are free! If you like romance novels, visual novels, or cute guys, then we think that you will love our games!
So download one of our free games today, and find out why our games are so popular!

description: A very very addictive matching puzzle game with colorful toys. It will make you cannot stop once you start playing, an new free puzzle game!   The rule is very simple. Tap two cubes in a same color at least and they will blast. if you collapse more than 2 cubes at a moment, some very strong boosters will be created and help you to pop blocks and collect toys. It takes your mind off the frustrations of the day and You will feel relaxed and enjoyable.   It is a unique blast game. No more crushing candy, breaking diamonds, crunching cookies or farming. It is a great way to show you skills to blast & crush the toons!  The puzzles are not always easy to save toys but challenge your mind sometimes. You have to keep your mind and strain brain because there are toys and toons hiding under blocks deeply. There are many useful tips to help you after starting colorful adventure. Boosters can help you to collapse cubes and collect toys and toons.   - Bomb: Blast around cubes  - Viva Fan: Blast same color cubes. - Collapse Rocket: crush pop bricks and cubes in a line. - Extra 5 Steps: add 5 moves to help you blast the levels.  FEATURES:• Manually designed levelsMore funny levels are under development.• Staggering graphicsThe art design is colorful and beautiful. It's a game for all ages.• Lovely themesMany fantastic themes you can choose.• BoostersBlast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. • Earn rewards quickly  Many ways to win awesome rewards — solve puzzles, daily bonus, free coins, activity gifts etc. • No device limit Sync where you left easily between different devices with facebook account!Learn more about the game!Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/VivablastJoyMania You can play Viva Blast : Blast Pop Cubes games for FREE! Questions? this game is a thousand times better than agar.io in my opinion! It's so much easier to get onto the leader board. Every time I play I get onto the leader board. It's just so addicting and I can't get enough. Everyone in my family loves it too. Creating your own skin is a great option as well. My only complaint is that the 'play online' option is very laggy, and if you fix it would be much appreciated. Thanks for a great game, from sinéad, ella, lauren, mollie, shane and ollie 😊😊

This is better than the browser version for multiple reasons. 1) It doesn't lag as much. I played a few rounds a noticed a little bit of lag, but it's better than the browser version.  2) You can play against AI if you don't want to play against people. I like this because I actually had a chance to win and was able to kill some. 3) You can create your own custom skin, which is awesome. All of this is free as well. I love this version of Slither.io.

So I think just about everyone has heard of this game... Buuuuuuut there are some newbies here so I'll explain. Its a multiplayer game and It's in my opinion that It is probibly #2 best game I've ever played. Great concept and I like to get creative on makeing a snake/worm thing. A+ grade. 👌👍

Playing this game is total fun. But It would be more Awesome if there will be some sounds & a pause button maybe. One more thing, somebody tell me how to BOOST the Slither because everyone is boosting except me😭😌😶🙄😓😑😫🙃

The controlls are pretty bad considering how simple they are.  The lag is unbearable. Fix those and you've got a 5star game all day. Simple fun pick up and put down time killer. In fact the lag is such an issue however, the game is getting uninstalled. You can't play a reaction based game when the lag has you 6 seconds behind whats going on.
description: Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!Download now and start slithering! Good luck!
descriptionHTML:
Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?

If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!

In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!

Download now and start slithering! Good luck!

description: Race through Heartlake City in LEGO® Friends: Heartlake Rush! This fast, fun, and furious endless runner puts you in the driver’s seat as you jump, duck, and swerve through the busy streets in your LEGO racer! Can you complete all 60 levels?Drive as Andrea, Mia, Olivia, Emma, Stephanie, or their friends as you zip through the city and collect coins and other special items. Unlock decorations, new vehicles, and new playable characters! Find and collect Zobo, and he’ll transform your racer into a jet plane soaring above Heartlake City!- DRIVE through Heartlake City as your favorite Friends character!- COLLECT coins, ice cream, fruit, flowers, gifts, confetti bombs, and a special collectible item for each of the five Friends!- COMPLETE MISSIONS to level up and earn more coins!- DODGE enemies coming right at you!- DECORATE your cars with unlockable decals!- BOOST AND TRANSFORM your car into a jet by picking up Zobo the robot!- UNLOCK all 10 playable characters and cars by earning coin rewards!- MIX AND MATCH your characters, cars, and decals for a true LEGO building experience!- SAFETY FIRST: Play in a safe, closed environment, with NO third-party advertising, links to external websites, in-app purchases or hidden data collection. description:
* NOW WITH MULTIPLAYER MODE! *Get ready for some extreme waterslide action in the world’s craziest water park simulator! Survive as long as you can as you perform crazy stunts and blast through everything in your path! Whizz and bounce through rollercoaster-style corkscrews, loops and more! You’ll brave incredible water parks and dominate some seriously insane tracks. This is more than just fun in the sun…Have you got the skills to make it to the finish line in this epic, thrill-filled ride?
TAKE IT TO THE MAXTake the fun to another level when you choose from tons of rad “rides” like bathtubs, sharks, or jet skis, each with their own unique specs. The new multiplayer mode allows you to challenge friends and other uphill rush enthusiasts. Set up races, beat record, collect diamonds to unlock cool upgrades, and use power-ups to give you a boost!
RIDE YOUR WAY IN THE LEVEL EDITORCreate your own levels that can be played by your friends and other players from around the world. They will rate your levels and help you climb to the top of the leaderboard. Of course you can just play other players’ levels too, tons of new ones will be added daily!
SUPER FUN FEATURES:• Amazing new cruise ship world!• Conquer the world’s most dangerous attractions • Experience extreme water park thrills• Perform mind-blowing stunts • Choose from 20+ rides and many different characters and outfits• Master all levels in Level Mode• Survive as long as you can in Endless Mode• Create your own content in the Level Editor• Tons of new levels added every day by the community• Discover hidden diamonds and unlock power-ups• Conquer the global leaderboard• Play anytime, anywhere, no wi-fi needed!
Will you wipe out or will you prove yourself as a water park pro? Jump in now and find out!
  PRIVACY POLICYhttp://www.spilgames.com/mobile-apps-privacy-policy/TERMS OF USEhttp://www.spilgames.com/terms-of-use/

description: This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!>How to play?Place the pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.>Highlights:Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.A ranking system has also been added to challenge your friends, colleagues and circles.You can enjoy this brain game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
descriptionHTML:
This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!
It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.
It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!

>How to play?
Place the pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.
Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.

>Highlights:
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
A ranking system has also been added to challenge your friends, colleagues and circles.
You can enjoy this brain game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
summary: Amazing block game with a simple rule.
title: Puzzle Game

Okok now again event of summoning 100 scrolls and i continue still no 5 star hero only 4, just try and fix the drop rate. In the rest its a nice game.

Please do something!! I am vip6 but I'm not rich, please bring more rewards for loyal free users who watch the ads and everything!! Thank you!!

I purchased the spring festival card on top of all the money I've already dumped into this game and the devs didn't give me my in game rewards. I've submitted numerous tickets to get a refund or my rewards and they just reply there is no problem. Ya no problem with you taking my money.  They deleted my review, wonder how many other people had this issue and had reviews deleted.

Wasn't sure about this game at first. I love it. I use a f2p  and a vip one  to see  the difference  between the two. Really well done. Having said all that the game does require patience. This is an IDLE game. You pick it up do dailies, talk, spend money, or what ever you want to do in game, then put it down to "farm gold,xp,mats". The high end heros do take some planning to aquire as a f2p player. This game requires patience because it's an IDLE game. Yes some people have a ton of money to throw at the game but don't be jealous, just play your game and have fun.

There is certainly alot to do, but is there really much to DO do? I've just been continually tapping red dots and getting free prizes, which (although nice) doesn't feel like I'm especially earning anything, you know?  Feels like a game that will keep you occupied for maybe months, but a year after you delete it will you really REMEMBER it? Probably not.

Not what I expected, given that my first impression of it was of IH being an "annoying add". Once I decided to pick it up though my thoughts changed rather drastically.   It's simple, it's fun and the warm colour palette of the graphics make a nice change compared to the widespread use of bleak colours in other games.   If you think you might enjoy this game, you sure are my friend.

comments: Angry birds used to be fun, but the ridiculous amount of ads which actually interfere with game play has ruined it.  Waited a few years and tried it again.  Ads are worse now and lock up the game all the time.  I have a Galaxy S8 and fast Wi-Fi,  so it's not my phone.  Other apps work fine.

In 2013 I paid to remove the adds yet they are everywhere and proper in your face! What's the point of giving the option to remove them if you have no intention of doing it? Oh that's right, because all you care about is your bottom line and you don't give a damn about your paying customers!

AS EARLIER SAID, ENOUGH OF NUISANCE, DOWNGRADING TO 1STAR. GAME KEEPS HANGING, ADS KEEP INCREASING, WHAT A MESS TO SUCH A ONCE BEAUTIFUL GAME.

description: Use the unique powers of the Angry Birds to destroy the greedy pigs' defenses!  The survival of the Angry Birds is at stake. Dish out revenge on the greedy pigs who stole their eggs. Use the unique powers of each bird to destroy the pigs’ defenses. Angry Birds features challenging physics-based gameplay and hours of replay value. Each level requires logic, skill and force to solve.  If you get stuck in the game, you can purchase the Mighty Eagle! Mighty Eagle is a one-time in-app purchase in Angry Birds that gives unlimited use. This phenomenal creature will soar from the skies to wreak havoc and smash the pesky pigs into oblivion. There’s just one catch: you can only use the aid of Mighty Eagle to pass a level once per hour. Mighty Eagle also includes all new gameplay goals and achievements!  In addition to the Mighty Eagle, Angry Birds now has power-ups! Boost your birds’ abilities and three-star levels to unlock secret content! Angry Birds now has the following amazing power-ups: Sling Scope for laser targeting, King Sling for maximum flinging power, Super Seeds to supersize your birds, and Birdquake to shake pigs’ defenses to the ground!  HAVING TROUBLE? comments: I absolutely love this game. The music is good, the challenges are really fun and... well, challenging. It has taken me several days of being asked by the game if I would like to review it because I was having so much fun and didn't want to stop playing long enough to review. But here you have it. This game is well deserving of a great review. I'm going to go back to the game now so I can keep on rushing.

Awesome game I had ever played in my life... although I'm 20 just..😉😉 I just loved the game.today 21/02/2018 I installed it on my phone.within 1 hr I played 100+ times. Till now my highest score is 74 & I'm in challenge 25. Really loved this game very much. I recommend this game to my each & every friend...(even my enemy also...😂😂 Just kidding) I wished that I will cross 1000+ score on future.  Loved this game. Lots of Love to this game & ketchapp. 😘😘😘❤️❤️❤️

A simple, addictive yet hard and raging game. I love how you can customize your spheres and roads--and to turn off the ads just turn off your WiFi or data. Honestly, after 250 it gets a little impossible to play lol. Keep up the good work, Ketchapp!

Enjoyed, On a overall basis i really enjoyed the game. And i also finished all the 100 challenges within a time of 5 days, as the game is really captivating i kept on continuously playing it. But now i am kind of bored from it as there's nothing to do after i have completed the 100 challenges. If there is an addition of another 100 more challenges that would make the game more fun to play and i would enjoy it thoroughly. Also i am not sure how will i earn the other spehers and roads without any challenges, so if anyone can help me how in figuring that out it would be really nice. At the end the game is really good. Cheers to the creaters.

Minus another star because it's now glitchy and no longer gives daily bonus. I'm on challenge 89 and the point accumulation is taking forever. Minus one star because the ad at the bottom gets in the way while playing. I'll be on a good run and barely graze the ad space and it stops the game and ends the run. Very frustrating.

I'm obsessed with this game. It's not just playing to beat your best score. There are challenges that you can beat as you play and it makes it okay to have a bad run sometimes because you can still beat the challenge lol. Not frustrating, just so much fun. Not sure if my review makes sense, just play this game ok.

comments: This game is a PUBG clone using Minecraft graphics. Because of that, I downloaded it as a joke. However, this game is surprisingly good. It runs well and is fun, so I would highly suggest getting it.   Edit: I see lots of people talking about boring gameplay, and I think they just haven't had a good game. After over 50 games and plenty of wins, this game is always fun to drop in to
I think the only good aspect is auto ahot if i was on the devolper team i would suggest that the frame rate should be worked on. I get crazy kill streaks there should be awards cor that.
It's the worst game I ever played it's sending me off my page just so I can watch an ads please fix this game   I would rate it 5 but please make it stop sending me off my game just to see an ad
I absolutely adore this game! The controls are a bit clunky but other than that the games great!  One thing though, how do you make replays?
This game is really good just got it yesterday and already played 37 games of it. Its not very vilent but its really fun to play
Great gameplay keep the small map but one problem when I shoot at sometimes it counts like he killed me first even though it shows I did
description: Grand Battle Royale Season 2018! If you like military blocky pixel games and battle royale games then you will definitely like Grand Battle Royale! BATTLE in online multiplayer games when you play the new massive open world game! Survive the battlegrounds, improve your shooting skills, and develop new PVP tactics for FREE!Jump out of the survival plane on the dead island, find the best loot, kill the enemies. Players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents. Find the best weapons you can: Assault Rifle, pixel gun, smg, shotguns and other weapons. Dominate the battlefield by taking on each opponent and become last survivor #1! Grab your pixel gun and get shooting! The location of the battlegrounds is a distant island with dead city somewhere in the sea surrounded with a mysterious Blue Zone. Your main task is to stay inside the safe zone and eliminate all your enemies. Features: • Pixel Graphics & Blocky Characters: Battle as hilarious blocky characters and show your style of gameplay.• Survive gun games against other players!• Battle in Online Multiplayer Games: Intense PVP gameplay against players around the world!• Guns will randomly appear, so search the ground thoroughly! Survive by collecting more guns so you have an advantage over other players.• Just like in true 3D block survival games, you can purchase any pixel block strike skins.• Grab a pixel gun and dive into battle: Fun pixel graphics great for intense shooting battles!• Big radiation island this is the place where you have to survive while you playing in the blocky city. • Multiplayer game is absolutely free online game for download. Become the last man standing, the last hero, the king of the battlefield! Good luck, good hunt!This game requires an internet connection.Don’t miss out on the latest news:Like us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/GameSpireFollow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GameSpire_orgHere is the promo code for a free reward: XXXYYZZZ
descriptionHTML:
Grand Battle Royale Season 2018! If you like military blocky pixel games and battle royale games then you will definitely like Grand Battle Royale!

BATTLE in online multiplayer games when you play the new massive open world game! Survive the battlegrounds, improve your shooting skills, and develop new PVP tactics for FREE!
Jump out of the survival plane on the dead island, find the best loot, kill the enemies. Players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents. Find the best weapons you can: Assault Rifle, pixel gun, smg, shotguns and other weapons. Dominate the battlefield by taking on each opponent and become last survivor #1! Grab your pixel gun and get shooting!

The location of the battlegrounds is a distant island with dead city somewhere in the sea surrounded with a mysterious Blue Zone. Your main task is to stay inside the safe zone and eliminate all your enemies.

Features:
• Pixel Graphics & Blocky Characters: Battle as hilarious blocky characters and show your style of gameplay.
• Survive gun games against other players!
• Battle in Online Multiplayer Games: Intense PVP gameplay against players around the world!
• Guns will randomly appear, so search the ground thoroughly! Survive by collecting more guns so you have an advantage over other players.
• Just like in true 3D block survival games, you can purchase any pixel block strike skins.
• Grab a pixel gun and dive into battle: Fun pixel graphics great for intense shooting battles!
• Big radiation island this is the place where you have to survive while you playing in the blocky city.

Become the last man standing, the last hero, the king of the battlefield! Good luck, good hunt!

comments: Lost all of my bikes when I re-download the app. It shows the 500+ wins I have, but I don't even see a way to get the basic ones unlocked again without paying for their stupid VIP package. It sucks that they ruined this app, looking at the iOS version its obvious they haven't bothered to update this in years.

This game is AMAZING. YOU DEFINITELY need it. There is only 1 thing that I hope this game will have, I really want them to have CPU's on multi-player and on tournaments and duels because it says check your internet connection when I try to play them. But still this game is the best. So if you're searching for a game just get BIKE race and you probably won't need any other game.

Overall, the game is OK . But there is a few issues. My bike tips back and I can't stop it from tipping back until I die. But this doesn't happen all the time. It happens about every five weeks. Also, I was given a 5$ gift card and a 10$ gift card but I can't buy any of the bikes.

It's a fun little game at first, but has many, many flaws. You have to link it to your Facebook account if you wanna play all maps. There are way too many ads, they force you to buy their bikes which are ridiculously overpriced and overpowered, so you can't play multiplayer because people who bought those bikes will always beat you. That's just ridiculous. Not to mention it's very buggy. Sometimes you're racing someone who's in a completely different track than you. It used to be fun, now it's just stupid.

Been playing for a few years and absolutely love the game.  Got a new phone, Moto G5 Plus, and now there is a half second pause every time I hit the gas or break in every race.  Extremely annoying when you're racing friends.

Fun game but its lame the only bikes that have boosted stats are super expensive. And it's really dumb that the stats don't scale up with the cost of the bike. They have a range of 100 to 350 with the ultra bike and 300 for the super bike, that leaves plenty of room for various speed levels. The helmet and trick type perks are cool but not enough of an incentive. Need more to play, pay, or fight for.
description: Bike Race is one of the best racing game on Android! Race and have fun against millions of players. Bike Race is one of the top-rated free games! And it's free! Speed up the wheels and get ready for fun!Addictive racing gameplay- New game mode: Tournaments!- Race against millions of users on multiplayer- Train on single player to improve your skills- Fun guaranteed- Simple and intuitive driver controls- Challenge your facebook friends- Play without wifiAmazing features-Hundreds of crazy tracks and mad worlds-Cool stunts-Tons of amazing bikes- Don't miss the free updates with lots of new contentForget those dumb drag car racing games. To become a master motorcycle, skills matter (a lot). As they say: no pain, no gain! So, start practicing right now to become a pro bike racer and rule them all. It will be addicting, we guarantee fun at the tip of your finger!Bike Race is brought to you by Top Free Games - the creators of the addicting game: Racing Penguin.● Details about user created levelsIf you want to play more than 3 featured user created levels per day, you will need to buy a level pack. You can play unlimited free levels created by you or your friends if you have their codes. You can also play unlimited free levels shared publicly on the internet by other users. Levels can not be created on a mobile device. To create a level, surf to www.bikerace.com● Play it anywhereBike race free does NOT require any internet connection. you can have fun racing in the subway, while flying on a (real) plane, in the car on the road, during services in a temple (or maybe even on the toilet!)● Low data usageThis free game will not consume tons of data from your mobile plan that you'd want to use instead to surf the web, watch youtube videos and listen to free music● Compatibility and supportWe're continuously working (hard) so that all Android phones and tablets run the game smoothly. please report any issue you may experience to support+bikeraceandroid@topfreegames.com● Age rating disclaimerIt does NOT contain violence nor any other mature content. it's just a simple and straightforward racing game. feel free to play it with your boys and children. we bet it will be fun and they're gonna love it!● Privacy policyhttp://www.topfreegames.com/privacy/bikerace
descriptionHTML:
Bike Race is one of the best racing game on Android! Race and have fun against millions of players. Bike Race is one of the top-rated free games! And it's free! Speed up the wheels and get ready for fun!

Addictive racing gameplay
- New game mode: Tournaments!
- Race against millions of users on multiplayer
- Train on single player to improve your skills
- Fun guaranteed
- Simple and intuitive driver controls
- Challenge your facebook friends
- Play without wifi

Amazing features
-Hundreds of crazy tracks and mad worlds
-Cool stunts
-Tons of amazing bikes
- Don't miss the free updates with lots of new content

Forget those dumb drag car racing games. To become a master motorcycle, skills matter (a lot). As they say: no pain, no gain! So, start practicing right now to become a pro bike racer and rule them all. It will be addicting, we guarantee fun at the tip of your finger!

Bike Race is brought to you by Top Free Games - the creators of the addicting game: Racing Penguin.

● Details about user created levels
If you want to play more than 3 featured user created levels per day, you will need to buy a level pack. You can play unlimited free levels created by you or your friends if you have their codes. You can also play unlimited free levels shared publicly on the internet by other users. Levels can not be created on a mobile device. To create a level, surf to www.bikerace.com

● Play it anywhere
Bike race free does NOT require any internet connection. you can have fun racing in the subway, while flying on a (real) plane, in the car on the road, during services in a temple (or maybe even on the toilet!)

● Low data usage
This free game will not consume tons of data from your mobile plan that you'd want to use instead to surf the web, watch youtube videos and listen to free music

● Compatibility and support
We're continuously working (hard) so that all Android phones and tablets run the game smoothly. please report any issue you may experience to support+bikeraceandroid@topfreegames.com

● Age rating disclaimer
It does NOT contain violence nor any other mature content. it's just a simple and straightforward racing game. feel free to play it with your boys and children. we bet it will be fun and they're gonna love it!

● Privacy policy
http://www.topfreegames.com/privacy/bikerace

comments: This is an extremely fun game. O have a few suggestions on how to fix things on the game. I noticed three things while playing this game. 1. There is not a continue playing option. This can easily be fixed and with all of the great work from Dvloper I think that this is not too far away. 2. I noticed you can uncrouch in the tunnel in the basement even though you are not all the way through. 3. Everything is in a certain place. If one object is in a certain place then if you are familiar with the game enough you will know where the other objects are. To be honest this is not a minor concern but still could be fixed. Other than that I can't stop playing! Thank you so much!!

I love this game, especially when you hide just in time and there's that tense moment wondering if she saw you. I get chills down my spine when I'm hiding and I hear her saying "I see you". If I could, I would give this game 100 stars. I would suggest having a mode after you beat Granny to become Granny because I think it would be cool to chase the player around the house. Also, I think the game would benefit from a much bigger house, more drawers and of course, more locks. Love the game, keep up the good work.

It's really really really fun game.  But I think if you guys do some more improvements so it will be much fun.  Here's what I think:  1. I think you should make the house much bigger.  2. You should add more enemies for example:  child o' slenderina,  slenderman and the spiders.  3. You should add an Adventure mode.  Where you need to find some books or something like an emblem like that stuff to make them uncursed like that.  4. Last but not least, you should add more weapons for example:  Pistol,  sword,  injection etc.    If you do that,  it will be super cool and fun.   ThanQ 😃👍

It's definatly one of the better (more fun) horror games on the store, but I feel like there could be some more improvements. Firstly I think that if you've completed hard than there should be an (almost) impossible mode. Also minor details such as different textures and Easter eggs would be good. Last, I think that when you escape there should be an outside section where it's still got puzzles but it's more about the atmosphere. (Maybe that could just be for the "impossible mode") but it would make the game a lot more enjoyable. Also maybe a reward for escaping. (For incentive). Thank you and maybe you could take this into consideration :) also new app icon plz

Who doesn't love this game? It's bone chilling and exciting for the whole family (Litterally my whole fam plays this game) it would be cool to have a mode where there was no granny just to explore the house and get a feel for how to escape. Also some weapons to attack granny. Lastly a map of where granny is would be super cool. Good luck!

It's a vary good game so hood i can't believe it's on mobile game! Also the game mechanics are so amazing as well. Then there's series of things you have to do that keeps you in the game for a long time; the theme and music fit the atmosphere, and there's not much of a problem with the game either. "This game gives me goosebumps!" (From Dashigames aka Dachi) he loves it as well too. #goodgamemakemore
description: Welcome to Granny.Granny keeps you locked in her house.Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.You have 5 days.Good luck!The game contains advertisement.
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Granny.

Granny keeps you locked in her house.
Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.
If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.
You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.
You have 5 days.

Good luck!

The game contains advertisement.

description: Jaramba är Sveriges största app för små barn och samlar allt roligt på ett och samma ställe! Här hittar ni allt från underhållande film till pedagogiska spel och roliga pyssel i mer än 700 olika aktiviteter – innehåll som motsvarar mängder av appar i en och samma!I Jaramba finns något för alla då vi sorterar vårt innehåll baserat på intressen. Gillar du att måla? Prinsar och prinsessor? Djur? Eller kanske dinosaurier? I Jaramba hittar ni allt det och även massor av barnens favoriter som Pino, Hello Kitty och Babblarna!Appen är dessutom lätt att navigera och designad för att barn själva ska kunna lära sig att hitta sina favoriter utan hjälp. Därför har vi även valt bort reklam och köp i appen – allt för en trygg och säker upplevelse.Hur fungerar Jaramba?• Jaramba lägger till fler spel, filmer, upplästa böcker och annat roligt varje månad. Bläddra i de olika kategorierna för att hitta dina favoriter!• I favoritlistan sparas automatiskt de aktiviteter som används mest.• Du kan skapa upp till tre individuella profiler för varje barnanvändare där var och en kan välja sin egen avatar och se sina egna favoriter i favoritlistan.• Jaramba streamar sitt innehåll direkt på en android-enhet så appen tar inget onödigt utrymme!Du kan prova Jaramba gratis i en månad! Gillar ni appen behöver ni inte göra mer än att låta abonnemanget fortsätta så länge ni använder den. Jarambas abonnemang förnyas en gång per månad och du kan avsluta det när du vill. Ladda hem Jaramba och registrera dig idag för att komma igång!_______________________________________________________________________Om du startat ett Jaramba Premium-abonnemang via Google Play Store:När du prenumererar på Jaramba sker betalningen genom ditt Google Play-konto när du bekräftar köpet. Prenumerationen förlängs automatiskt och ditt Google Play-konto debiteras tidigast 24 timmar innan innevarande prenumeration löper ut. Du kan stänga av den automatiska förnyelsen via Google Play > Meny > Konto > Prenumerationer på din Android-enhet. Ingen återbetalning sker om prenumerationen avslutas innan den löpt ut.Om du inte startade din prenumeration via Google Play Store kan du ändra inställningarna genom Jarambas Mina Sidor.Integritetspolicy: https://www.jaramba.se/policy/Användarvillkor: https://www.jaramba.se/villkor/
descriptionHTML:
Jaramba är Sveriges största app för små barn och samlar allt roligt på ett och samma ställe! Här hittar ni allt från underhållande film till pedagogiska spel och roliga pyssel i mer än 700 olika aktiviteter – innehåll som motsvarar mängder av appar i en och samma!

I Jaramba finns något för alla då vi sorterar vårt innehåll baserat på intressen. Gillar du att måla? Prinsar och prinsessor? Djur? Eller kanske dinosaurier? I Jaramba hittar ni allt det och även massor av barnens favoriter som Pino, Hello Kitty och Babblarna!
Appen är dessutom lätt att navigera och designad för att barn själva ska kunna lära sig att hitta sina favoriter utan hjälp. Därför har vi även valt bort reklam och köp i appen – allt för en trygg och säker upplevelse.

Hur fungerar Jaramba?

• Jaramba lägger till fler spel, filmer, upplästa böcker och annat roligt varje månad. Bläddra i de olika kategorierna för att hitta dina favoriter!
• I favoritlistan sparas automatiskt de aktiviteter som används mest.
• Du kan skapa upp till tre individuella profiler för varje barnanvändare där var och en kan välja sin egen avatar och se sina egna favoriter i favoritlistan.
• Jaramba streamar sitt innehåll direkt på en android-enhet så appen tar inget onödigt utrymme!

Du kan prova Jaramba gratis i en månad! Gillar ni appen behöver ni inte göra mer än att låta abonnemanget fortsätta så länge ni använder den. Jarambas abonnemang förnyas en gång per månad och du kan avsluta det när du vill. Ladda hem Jaramba och registrera dig idag för att komma igång!

_______________________________________________________________________


Om du startat ett Jaramba Premium-abonnemang via Google Play Store:
När du prenumererar på Jaramba sker betalningen genom ditt Google Play-konto när du bekräftar köpet. Prenumerationen förlängs automatiskt och ditt Google Play-konto debiteras tidigast 24 timmar innan innevarande prenumeration löper ut. Du kan stänga av den automatiska förnyelsen via Google Play > Meny > Konto > Prenumerationer på din Android-enhet. Ingen återbetalning sker om prenumerationen avslutas innan den löpt ut.

Om du inte startade din prenumeration via Google Play Store kan du ändra inställningarna genom Jarambas Mina Sidor.

Integritetspolicy: https://www.jaramba.se/policy/
Användarvillkor: https://www.jaramba.se/villkor/
developerAddress:
Streamience AB
Valhallavägen 140
114 59 Stockholm
recentChanges: Bättre uppspelning av ljud och bild på äldre enheter.
summary: Sweden's largest app for young children - 700+ games, books and movies for children 1-6 years
title: Jaramba - Stava, räkna och lek

comments: Such a Blast to Play. App never seems to grow boring like some other games. Also the apps not constantly hounding you to spend on Upgrades and Advances which is nice. Your character jumps higher, flips and twirls faster as U advance further. I play it once or twice a day at least. All in All a great/fun app....ENJOY !!

The game is very fun and progression is steady as you get better, on the downside once you get through your first play through with the app and come back later there are 30 second adds that pop up after every other round or so. A little disappointing but no biggie the game is really quite fun.

I feel like I would really like this game but it is not working on the Android phone. So I have never actually played the game but I have tried to open it up like 50 times.  Every time I tried to open it, it would just lag out right when it was going to show me the home screen.  If this gets fixed then I will play this game and most likely enjoy the game but for now it is awful.

In this game once you have all of the flips it gets really boring. Also there are way to many ad breaks. This game was really fun but now that it's newer it's boring. It lags to much and kicks me out. I give this 1 star

Ads ads and more ads. And really pushy ads that you can't just close straight away too. You spend more time watching ads than playing the game, and honestly you can't advance in the game without watching ads for coins anyway, so it's basically an advertisement with a mini game in between. Scummy sell out app.

This game is great but I would only rate it a five if there were less adds. Every game I play, as soon as I finished it said "add break". This is very annoying as the adds are up to 30 seconds long. Please get rid of them.

You no longer have to fantasize about being a goat, your dreams have finally come true!Goat Simulator Free is all about causing as much destruction as you possibly can as a goat. Goat Simulator Free is free to download and play, however, additional levels can be purchased for real money.
